titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the special limitation on total family benefits which is presently applicable in cases where the primary beneficiary is entitled to disability insurance benefits.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to repeal a specified provision which limits the total family benefits payable in cases where the primary beneficiary is entitled to disability benefits.
